column4: Hello, I just made a big mistake and was wondering if someone could help me. I deleted a file called "eggdrop" which was a shortcut to start the program I think. Because I can no longer start my eggdrop bot by typing ./eggdrop. Is there an easy way to recreate this file? Thanks...
I suppose you've checked you trash?
When I deleted the file it even told me that it would be permanent...so
